decks.notes: This Boros Aggro deck focuses on overwhelming your opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful spells. By utilizing cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, you can quickly deal damage and put pressure on your opponent. Cards like Goblin Bombardment and Galvanic Discharge provide additional removal and reach, while cards like Flooded Strand and Arid Mesa ensure consistent mana fixing. With a mix of creatures, spells, and land destruction, this deck aims to control the board and defeat your opponent before they can set up their own game plan.

This aggro deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's hand with spells like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize, while also using threats like Thought-Knot Seer and Nethergoyf to apply pressure. The deck also has a graveyard hate card in Nihil Spellbomb and interaction with artifacts and planeswalkers with Kozilek's Command. By combining disruption, threats, and utility lands like Urza's Saga, the deck aims to efficiently control the board and win through combat damage. The mono-black color identity allows for consistent mana production and a streamlined strategy.

This Dimir Control deck focuses on using a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and disruptive creatures to control the game and outvalue the opponent. By deploying threats at the right time and disrupting the opponent's game plan, the deck aims to maintain board control and limit the opponent's options. The inclusion of hand disruption with cards like Thoughtseize also helps to dismantle the opponent's game plan before it can be executed. With a mix of disruption, card advantage, and threats, this deck aims to control the game from start to finish.

This deck focuses on denying your opponent resources and controlling the game using cards like Ensnaring Bridge and Lantern of Insight. It aims to disrupt your opponent's strategy with cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize, while also utilizing Blood Moon to disrupt their mana base. The deck also includes cards like Codex Shredder and Profane Tutor to control the top of your opponent's library. Overall, the strategy is to lock down the game state and prevent your opponent from executing their game plan effectively.

The deck focuses on utilizing the Cascade mechanic to cast Living End and bring back powerful creatures from the graveyard to overwhelm the opponent. It includes cards that manipulate the top of the library to ensure Cascade hits Living End consistently, while also providing disruption with Force of Negation and Commandeer. Creatures like Curator of Mysteries and Waker of Waves offer card selection and pressure, while Endurance and Subtlety provide interaction with the opponent's graveyard and spells. The deck aims to quickly assemble the combo and win the game in a single explosive turn.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays and burning through opponent's life points quickly. It utilizes cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls to apply early pressure while also using burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment to deal direct damage. The deck also includes cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to create additional threats and disrupt opponent's strategies. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its fast-paced aggression and efficient removal options.

This deck focuses on quickly assembling the Allosaurus Rider and Autochthon Wurm combo to overwhelm the opponent with a massive creature and win the game in a single turn. The strategy involves utilizing cards like Eldritch Evolution and Neoform to search for the combo pieces, while also using Nourishing Shoal for additional life gain and protection. The deck includes cards like Chancellor of the Tangle and Gemstone Mine to accelerate mana production, allowing for the combo to be executed as early as possible. Various support cards such as Disciple of Freyalise and Sorin of House Markov help to support the combo strategy and protect against disruption from the opponent.

The main idea behind this deck is to quickly and aggressively deal damage to the opponent using cheap and efficient spells and creatures. The deck focuses on playing low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler, while also utilizing burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart to control the board and finish off opponents. The deck also includes card draw and manipulation spells like Preordain and Expressive Iteration to help maintain momentum and find key cards. Overall, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast-paced and aggressive playstyle.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through ramping up mana with Eldrazi Temple and Utopia Sprawl to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. The deck also includes a variety of spells like Kozilek's Return and Malevolent Rumble to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. By combining ramp and control elements, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful Eldrazi creatures while keeping the board under control.
